history.proof: intros m z H1 H2 i H3. unfold not. intros H4. destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H5 _]. qsimpl use: period_lub. srun best use: degree_diff_aux, Nat.le_refl, le_lt_n_Sm unfold: lt, P_degree_diff.

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 i H3.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H5 _].
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z i : nat H3 : 0 < i < degree m z H4 : Iter (f m) i z = z H5 : 0 < Iter_upb m z The term "period_lub m z" has type "inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> let nr := Iter_upb m z in 0 < nr /\\ Iter (f m) nr z = z /\\ (forall i : nat, 0 < i < nr -> Iter (f m) i z <> z)" while it is expected to have type "nat".

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 i H3.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H5 _].
exceptions.exn: In environment m : fmap z : dart H1 : inv_hmap m H2 : exd m z i : nat H4 : Iter (f m) i z = z H5 : 0 < Iter_upb m z H0 : 0 < i H3 : i < degree m z H : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> forall i : nat, 0 < i -> i < Iter_upb m z -> Iter (f m) i z = z -> False H6 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> Iter (f m) (Iter_upb m z) z = z H7 : forall (m : fmap) (z : dart), inv_hmap m -> exd m z -> 0 < Iter_upb m z Unable to unify "0 < Iter_upb m z" with "False".

ctx: intros m z H1 H2 i H3.
destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H5 _].

original: intros m z H1 H2 i H3. unfold not. intros H4. unfold Iter_upb in H4. destruct (period_lub m z H1 H2) as [H5 _]. assert (H6: 0 < period_lub m z). { apply H5. } lia.
